Class DemoSelectorTreeNode

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.jfree.report.demo.util.DemoSelectorTreeNode
public class DemoSelectorTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.tree.TreeNode

A DemoSelectorTreeNode encapsulates a DemoSelector and makes it accessible from within a JTree.

Author:
Thomas Morgner
